channel.title: Help wit compiler!
channel.description:
ok so im working on my server and im done except for my compiling i cant get it to compile when i try to compile i get this error
Code: Server should be done in a few seconds,please wait. javac: file not found: *.java usage: <options> <source codes> use -help for possible options. press any key to continue...
the compile code i am using is
Code: @echo off COLOR 09 title DePredaTe's Compiler. echo Server should be done in a few seconds, please wait. "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_05\bin\javac.exe" *.java pause and the run.bat code i am using is
Code: @echo off COLOR 09 title Devolutionv7 Server java -Xmx1024m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.17-ga-bin.jar server pause im using windows VISTA
AND my jdk is jdk1.6.0_05 so if u can help me post or personel message me
i have been trying for weeks and in the past 2 days i have spent 17 HOURS tryign to do this PLEASE HELP ME!!!!!!!!!!!!! :

item.title: Help wit compiler!

item.title: Help wit compiler!
item.dc:creator: @pownage pownage
item.description:
@pownage wrote:

ok so im working on my server and im done except for my compiling i cant get it to compile when i try to compile i get this error

Code:
Server should be done in a few seconds,please wait.
javac: file not found: *.java
usage:
use -help for possible options.
press any key to continue…

the compile code i am using is

Code:
@echo off
COLOR 09
title DePredaTe’s Compiler.
echo Server should be done in a few seconds, please wait.
“C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_05\bin\javac.exe” *.java
pause
and the run.bat code i am using is

Code:
@echo off
COLOR 09
title Devolutionv7 Server
java -Xmx1024m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.17-ga-bin.jar server
pause
im using windows VISTA

AND my jdk is jdk1.6.0_05 so if u can help me post or personel message me

i have been trying for weeks and in the past 2 days i have spent 17 HOURS tryign to do this PLEASE HELP ME!!! :

Read full topic
